items.title: Anthropomorphic Design Principles
items.description: Comprehensive guide to anthropomorphic design principles for humanoid robots, covering human-inspired design, biomechanics, and functional considerations

items.title: Degrees of Freedom and Kinematic Chains
items.description: Comprehensive guide to degrees of freedom analysis and kinematic chain design for humanoid robots

items.title: Kinematic Chains and Joint Configurations
items.description: Advanced analysis of kinematic chains, joint configurations, and their applications in humanoid robot design
